entry.title: Possibly unevaluated variables
entry.content:
```scala scala> def loop: Boolean = loop :10: warning: method loop does nothing other than call itself recursively

   def loop: Boolean = loop
                       ^

loop: Boolean

scala> true || loop res34: Boolean = true

scala> true && loop

[need to Ctrl-C out at this point] ```

(I like that warning message!)
